outline:
1. river, stream, canal, Nile, Nile-canal
    1. stream, river (Nile)
    2. Nile-arms, Nile-canals
    3. watercourses
    4. shafts (mining)
    5. river (in general)
strongs_def: a channel, e.g. a fosse, canal, shaft; specifically the Nile, as the one river of Egypt, including its collateral trenches; also the Tigris, as the main river of Assyria
